entry.title: Awesome Music Updates on Sep 17 - Sep 23, 2018
entry.content:
Audio Tools

  • fre:ac (⭐1.6k) - free audio converter. It supports audio CD ripping and tag editing.
  • Jack (⭐16) - command-line CD ripper.
  • K3b (⭐173) - is a full-featured CD/DVD/Blu-ray burning and ripping application.
  • lltag (⭐36) - automatic command-line mp3/ogg/flac file tagger and renamer.
  • Rubyripper (⭐132) - is a secure digital audio extraction application ("cd ripper") for Unix-like operating systems.
  • split2flac (⭐256) - split flac/ape/wv/wav + cue sheet into separate tracks
  • Whipper (⭐1.3k) - Python CD-DA ripper preferring accuracy over speed.
  • X Audio Copy (⭐5) - GTK and GNOME application for ripping CD-Audio and encoding in lossy and lossless audio formats.

Music Programming

  • Inscore - an environmnent for the design of interactive, augmented music scores.

Music Theory Teaching

  • Four Score and More - Tailored music theory exercises based on scores.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Sep 17 - Sep 23, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Music Updates on Feb 01 - Feb 07, 2016
entry.content:
Audio Editing

  • Audacity (⭐14k) - a free, cross-platform digital audio editor.

Audio Libraries

  • howler.js (⭐25k) - a Javascript audio library for the modern web.
  • JSyn - an audio synthesis software API for Java.
  • midi.js (⭐3.9k) - a framework for creating web-based MIDI apps.
  • PortAudio - a free, cross-platform, open-source, audio I/O library.
  • RustAudio - an aggregate of free and useful Audio, DSP and music libraries written in Rust.

Audio Tools

  • Koel (⭐17k) - an open-source personal audio streaming server.
  • Lame - a high quality, free and open-source MP3 encoder.
  • Musikernel - a futuristic audio production platform (hardware support, APIs, hosts, plugins and more)
  • SoX - a free open-source command line utility for playing, converting and manipulating audio files.

Free Music Scores

  • cellist/Lilypond-Sheet-Music (⭐141) - a collection of music typeset with lilypond (mostly chamber music and music for cello).
  • ciconia/music (⭐25) - a collection of mostly baroque music, lots of sacred works by J. S. Bach, coded in lilypond/ripple.
  • CPDL - the choral public domain library contains more than 20K free scores of vocal music.
  • Éditions Nicolas Sceaux (⭐46) - baroque music scores (mainly French music), typeset using lilypond.
  • IMSLP - the International Music Score Library Project is the largest collection of public domain scores and parts on the web.
  • Mutopia (⭐274) - sheet music based on editions in the public domain.
  • wbsoft/lilymusic (⭐66) - beautiful LilyPond scores under free licenses.

MIDI Tools & Libraries

  • Timidity - an open-source command line synthesizer that plays MIDI files.

Music Notation

  • Denemo - a free music notation editor based on Lilypond.
  • Frescobaldi (⭐822) - a free Lilypond sheet music editor.
  • Guido - a generic, portable library and API for the graphical rendering of musical scores.
  • Inknote (⭐153) - free, open source, browser based music notation and composition software.
  • LibMEI (⭐62) - a C++ library for reading and writing MEI files.
  • Lilypond - free, open-source music engraving program, devoted to producing the highest-quality sheet music possible.
  • Lilypond Snippet Repository - an online database of Lilypond snippets ideas, features and hacks.
  • MuseScore (⭐13k) - free open-source music notation and composition software.
  • Python-ly - a tool and library for manipulating LilyPond files.
  • Verovio (⭐750) - a library and a toolkit for engraving MEI music notation into SVG.
  • Vexflow (⭐4.1k) - a JavaScript library for rendering music notation and guitar tablature.

Music Programming

  • Alda (⭐5.8k) - a music programming language for musicians.
  • Chuck (⭐915) - strongly-timed, concurrent, and on-the-fly music programming language.
  • CoffeeCollider (⭐222) - a language for real time audio synthesis and algorithmic composition in HTML5. "Write CoffeeScript, and be processed as SuperCollider."
  • Common Music - an open source music composition system.
  • Csound - a user-programmable and user-extensible sound processing language and software synthesizer.
  • IanniX (⭐369) - a graphical open-source sequencer, based on Iannis Xenakis works, for digital art.
  • Leipzig (⭐460) - a composition library for Overtone.
  • Music Suite - a language for generalized music notation and theory, based on Haskell.
  • Nyquist - a sound synthesis and composition language.
  • Overtone (⭐6k) - an Open Source toolkit for designing synthesizers and collaborating with music.
  • Platonic Music Engine - an open-source music generation framework written in Lua.
  • SuperCollider - a programming language for real time audio synthesis and algorithmic composition.

Standards

  • MEI (Music Encoding Initiative) - an open-source effort to define a system for encoding musical documents in a machine-readable structure.
  • MusicXML - the standard open format for exchanging digital sheet music.
  • SMuFL (Standard Music Font Layout) - a specification for mapping music symbols to Unicode for use in music fonts.
entry.summary: 44 awesome projects updated on Feb 01 - Feb 07, 2016
